bibl.title: A New Kushite Historiography: Three Recent Contributions to Nubian Studies.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: László TÖRÖK, The Kingdom of Kush. Handbook of the Napatan-Meroitic Civilization = Handbuch der Orientalistik. 31 (Leiden, 1997); - IDEM, with contributions by Inge HOFMANN and István NAGY, Meroe City, an Ancient African Capital. John Garstang's Excavations in the Sudan. Part One: Text; - Part Two: Figures and Plates = Occasional Publications. 12 (London, 1997); - Pamela ROSE, with a contribution by Penelope WILSON, Qasr Ibrim. The Hinterland Survey = Excavation Memoirs. 62 (London, 1996).
BURSTEIN Stanley M., A New Kushite Historiography: Three Recent Contributions to Nubian Studies.
